mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, salt, name, phone, email, register_time, is_admin FROM User ORDER BY register_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (password, salt, name, phone, email, register_time, is_admin) VALUES (#{password}, #{salt}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{isAdmin})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, is_admin = #{isAdmin} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
